explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of deep learning models for energy price prediction, which falls under the broader category of machine learning.
explanations.neural network: The paper proposes a Parallel Hybrid Neural Network (PHNN) model, which is a type of neural network architecture.
explanations.deep learning: The paper explicitly mentions the initial success of deep learning models in energy price prediction and proposes a novel deep learning architecture.
explanations.long short-term memory: The paper compares the performance of the PHNN model with a single LSTM model, indicating the use of LSTM in the research.
explanations.LSTM: The paper mentions LSTM (Long Short-Term Memory) as one of the models compared against the proposed PHNN model.
